attributes.title: Because
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to see in what ways I can support trump, and to seeWhat Trump is actually doingThat is good.I think it is absolutely awful that Trump and Trump supporters think that all lives matter. Black lives are the ones getting hurt for things they didn’t do. Why am I going to support somebody and their app, if they don’t support a movement that over half of the world is supporting.

attributes.title: My windows are broken and I have no chicken nuggets 🤬😤☹️💩🤬😤☹️💩
attributes.review: I was just simply using the app that I thought was great and I started to hear LOUD ringing noises only when the app was on the CRaCk ALL the windows shattered 😧then boom 💥 in the kitchen the microwave exploded well I was making chicken nuggets 🤤 but then when I got my chicky nuggets the were BURNT MY CHICKEN NUGGETS WERE BURNT 🤬that was my last chicky nuggets so now I have no chicky nuggets and no hope for this country

attributes.title: I wish I could give it 0 stars
attributes.review: I truly downloaded this app to find factual information about our president and our country, but instead I found inaccurate information. In addition, every time I opened this app, all the data on my phone deleted!! Now, my phone is wiped and has random glitches. 10 out of 10 do not recommend.

attributes.title: This app is terrible
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app zero stars but unfortunately I can’t. I downloaded this app and right when I opened it a black opened up and swallowed my house whole. I am now floating in space 🧚🏻✨ and I going to to die here because of this app. I mean not like I cared about death but space?!!! Not it. Anyways this app needs to be deleted so no one else dies in space🧚🏻

attributes.title: it was ✨scary✨
attributes.review: i downloaded the app so i can support this walking chetto man...i put my number in and then...i saw a naked orange 🍊!!! i didn’t know what to do so i threw my phone and now it’s broken😔. i tried giving it c. p. r. but that didn’t work. so i cried my self to sleep then i and a dream, the chetto man was in my house and when he left...THERE WAS CHEETO DUST EVERYWHERE. it took like 5 hours to get it out 😒. in conclusion the orange’s app is very ✨scary ✨.

attributes.title: terrible just ew
attributes.review:
so this app is ✨terrible✨, such a bad app. the coding is terrible, the news is fake, and when i opened the app a DANCING CHEETO appeared on my screen. the cheeto was screaming at me to vote for trump. have they really run out of ideas? welp idk about you but that cheeto could cause problems. many problems including nausea and foot pain. i would rather eat unicorn poo than use this garbage app.

     thanks, karen from whole foods.

attributes.title: Random viruses
attributes.review: DO NOT PUT YOUR INFORMATION INTO THE APP! This app litters my phone with viruses. Every time I open the app it crashes and I get random pop ups on my home screen that tells me things like "You have 30 seconds before the virus steals your info!" And the ONLY way to get rid of it is to completely hard reset your phone. This app has caused me so much hardship with my phone and it's terrible

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: I thought downloading this app would help me understand the president more. I thought it would be more from him and less media coverage to call “fake news” so it would be a better image of him. I was wrong. Even on his own app he is a narcissist and not a good fit for the 2020 election. I don’t understand why people keep this app on their phone. Rather...unfortunate.

attributes.title: Awful - glitchy
attributes.review: As an American, I wanted to make an informed decision on who to vote for in November. I gotta say, this app didn’t help at all! Once I downloaded it, it asked me to allow notifications. I accepted. But then the app kept crashing and closing on me. But it would spam me with notifications! How can I make an informed decision with an app that won’t open but fills my Notification Center with spam?!

attributes.title: This app made my dog viscously vomit everywhere
attributes.review: I came across this app and was like hm why not and as soon as I hit “Get” my dog just came in my room, stared me in the eyes, and vomit EVERYWHERE. I mean there was vomit in the floorboards, under the bed, in my pillow. I guess he did not like the fact that I had downloaded this app, so I guess if you don’t want to have your dog puke up their large intestine, stay away from this app😇
